mapper.select: SELECT C.*, S.SUB_NAME FROM (SELECT SUB_SEQ, SUB_CODE, PROF_ID FROM HD_CLASS_TB WHERE PROF_ID=#{profId}) C JOIN HD_SUBJECT_TB S ON C.SUB_SEQ=S.SUB_SEQ AND S.SUB_YEAR=#{acaYear} AND S.SUB_SEMESTER=#{acaSemester}

SELECT P.PROF_NAME, S.SUB_NAME, AR.* FROM (SELECT * FROM HD_ASGMT_REGD_TB WHERE PROF_ID=#{profId} AND SUB_SEQ=${subSeq}) AR JOIN HD_SUBJECT_TB S ON AR.SUB_SEQ=S.SUB_SEQ AND S.SUB_YEAR=#{acaYear} AND S.SUB_SEMESTER=#{acaSemester} JOIN HD_CLASS_TB C ON C.SUB_SEQ=S.SUB_SEQ JOIN HD_PROFESSOR_TB P ON AR.PROF_ID=P.PROF_ID ORDER BY ASGMT_REGD_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM HD_ASGMT_REGD_TB WHERE PROF_ID=#{profId} AND SUB_SEQ=${subSeq}) AR JOIN HD_SUBJECT_TB S ON AR.SUB_SEQ=S.SUB_SEQ AND S.SUB_YEAR=#{acaYear} AND S.SUB_SEMESTER=#{acaSemester} JOIN HD_CLASS_TB C ON C.SUB_SEQ=S.SUB_SEQ ORDER BY ASGMT_REGD_DATE DESC

SELECT P.PROF_NAME, S.SUB_NAME, AR.* FROM (SELECT * FROM HD_ASGMT_REGD_TB WHERE PROF_ID=#{profId} AND SUB_SEQ=#{subSeq} AND ASGMT_NO=#{asgmtNo}) AR JOIN HD_SUBJECT_TB S ON AR.SUB_SEQ=S.SUB_SEQ AND S.SUB_YEAR=#{acaYear} AND S.SUB_SEMESTER=#{acaSemester} JOIN HD_CLASS_TB C ON C.SUB_SEQ=S.SUB_SEQ JOIN HD_PROFESSOR_TB P ON AR.PROF_ID=P.PROF_ID
